reviewText: This is a compelling video.  Some of the presentation was over my (non-medical) head, however I learned a lot.  I was disappointed that no real specifics were given in many instances,  just generalities, but nevertheless I'm glad I bought it.
Brilliant man!  He will be missed!
Everyone interested in cancer needs to read the writings of Dr. Gonzalez, and listen to every You-Tube video available.. His was another "strange and unexplained death."

I gained great knowledge with this DVD and I intend to watch it again since he gives a lot of great information in this video. I have a medical background and I understood everything Dr Gonzales talks about sympathetic and parasympathetic systems. If you do not have a medical background, it might be a little harder for you to understand but with little research online anyone will be able to understand his research and protocol when treating patients. I like his approach on health and definitely recommend this book to anyone. This DVD helped me in choosing the right doctor. Thank you for making this DVD.
Truth & Wisdom in one  Highly recommend

As a Functional Medicine and Cancer Coach, I believe that Dr. Gonzalez must  be regarded as one of the most influential and compassionate doctors of our time. Anyone facing a health crisis should view this CD and use the information as part of their personal healing protocol.

A 4 hour lecture that is worth twice the price. One of the greatest doctors in the modern era. If you are not familiar with this brilliant and honorable man, check out his youtube videos and then buy this comprehensive lecture. Highly recommended.

If you want to do all you can to prevent or recover from cancer, this is another tool that has shown excellent benefit for many. No hype, Just good information by one of the most respected cancer doctors ever. Buy it and study it to see the results of eating properly for your type. I strongly recommend all material by Dr. Gonzalez.
There will never be enough recordings of the late, great Dr. Gonzalez. Absolute brilliance.
Like drinkin outta da fire hose
